original_text: So when you give something to a poor person, keep it a secret from other people. Do not tell anyone. Your left hand will not even know what your right hand does!
korean_text: 너는 구제할 때에 오른손이 하는 것을 왼손이 모르게 하여

sentences.original_text: So when you give something to a poor person
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 네가 가난한 사람에게 무언가 줄 때

sentences.original_text: keep it a secret from other people
Your left hand will not even know
